name: Oneyear
description:
My partner @Albert made this game. He is the best!

I helped in level design, art design advice, and test.  We designed the characters and levels based on our real stories in daily life. Feel free to play and experience our stories in the last 365 days. 

A tip for level2: you need to jump and make the "CALIX" turn green  (the restaurant  we first met)
